Class CardMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Options, Selector
    public abstract class CardMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable
    A card-like panel on the main menu. Contains methods for grid-based rendering and interfaces with a controller.

        protected void render​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      int cellIndex,
                      double cellSize)
        Updates proportions to fit on screen and paints graphics.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics used to draw.
        cellIndex - The index of this card.
        cellSize - The size of each drawing cell.
